wikitext.*:
'''Bob Joles''' ([[16 July|July 16]], [[1959]]) is an American voice actor. 

Though successful with several other roles, Bob Joles is a proficient (and profitable) [[John Rhys-Davies]]-impersonator. Apart from playing all Rhys-Davies' roles on [[Electronic Arts]]' video games, Joles also took over his roles of [[wikipedia:Hades (DC Comics)|Hades]] in ''[[wikipedia:Justice League Unlimited|Justice League Unlimited]]'' and [[wikipedia:List of characters in SpongeBob SquarePants#Minor characters|ManRay]] in ''[[wikipedia:SpongeBob SquarePants|SpongeBob SquarePants]]''.
==Roles==
* [[2011]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'' - Unspecified
* [[2009]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Conquest]]'': [[Gimli]], [[Treebeard]], Uruk-Hai
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'': [[Gimli]], [[Dáin Ironfoot]], Additional voices
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'': [[Gimli]], [[Treebeard]], Additional voices
